title: Free museums in nyc?
content:
What museums are free? Students get into MoMA for free, MET is suggested admission.

What else? Natural History?
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
thanks!

natural history museum is free.

jabez, nice links -- it's handy to have all that info on a convenient list or two.

And Richard, I didn't even know that museum had something like that! Thanks. :-)
Good one Richard—looks like I’m going to the South Street Seaport tomorrow!
